reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

description.narrative: Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA) Somalia supports the humanitarian response and advocacy efforts of the Deputy Special Representative of the Secretary-General and Resident and Humanitarian Coordinator, humanitarian partners and government authorities at federal and state levels. Decades of conflict, climatic shocks - characterized by recurrent droughts and seasonal floods - and severe economic decline continue to drive the people of Somalia into a state of a protracted humanitarian crisis. OCHA continues to contribute to strengthening the links between humanitarian, development and peace partners to respond to immediate humanitarian needs, while supporting longer term solutions to build community resilience and break the vulnerability cycle. In collaboration with all relevant actors, OCHA mobilizes action for preparedness advocates for a coordinated approach to addressing durable solutions for IDPs and issues of climate change, especially in relation to drought and flood management.

Xafiiska Isku-dubbarridka Arrimaha Gargaarka (OCHA) ee Soomaaliya wuxuu taageeraa gurmadka bini’aadamnimada iyo dadaallada loogu qareemayo dadka tabaaleysan ee Ku-Xigeenka Wakiilka Xog-hayaha Guud ahna Isu-duwaha Arrimaha Gargaarka ee Soomalia, hay’adaha gargaarka iyo maamullada dowladda ee heer federal iyo heer dowlad-goboleed intaba. Tobannaan sano oo colaado ah, mashaqooyin cimilada la xiriira-oo ay dhacayeen abaaro iyo fatahaado is xigxiga-iyo hoos-u-dhac dhaqaale ayaa dadka Soomaaliyeed dhexda ka fariisiyay mashaqooyin bini’aadamnimo oo daba dheeraaday. OCHA waxay sii wadeysaa isku xirka hay’adaha ka shaqeeya gargaarka bini’aadamnimo, mashaariicda horumarineed iyo nabadda iney si wadajir ah uga jawaabaan baahiyaha bini’aadamnimo ayadoo isla markaasna gacan la siinayo xalalka muddada fog si loo dhiso askeysiga bulshada loona jebiyo meertada nugeylka. Ayadoo la kaashanayo dhammaan dhinacyada ay khuseyso, OCHA waxay ku howlantahay sidii xal waara loogu heli lahaa dadka gudaha waddanka ku barakacay iyo qaddiyadaha la xiriira isbedellada cimilada gaar ahaan marka ay timaaddo maareynta abaaraha iyo fatahaadaha.
